dict.acceptation: 水池；石油层；（液体等的）一滩；共同储金；
使形成池塘或水洼；淤积；合伙经营；采（煤等）；

sent.orig: Because Commons-DBCP uses Commons-Pool, then the relation of them is introduced.
sent.trans: 由于Commons-DBCP使用了Commons-Pool,所以也描述了它们两者之间的联系。

sent.orig: The pool identified as the reclamation storage pool must be a primary sequential storage pool.
sent.trans: 回收存储池的池的类型必须是主顺序存储池。

sent.orig: Its wide range of hydrotherapy facilities includes relaxing artic pool, saltwater pool and aromatherapy massage pool.
sent.trans: 内设大型的水疗浸浴区、香薰牛奶池、盐池、智能按摩浴池和北极冰池。

sent.orig: The scholar foolishly had the educate cooling pool for swimming pool.
sent.trans: 学者愚蠢的把学院的冷却池当成游泳池。

sent.orig: Water-proof for water tower, pool, oil pool, toilet, internal and external wall and floor.
sent.trans: 水塔、游泳池、油池、厕卫间及室内、外墙地面防水。
